item.title: Risk Management
item.author: mark@thefullertonian.com (Mark Stouffer)
item.description: Chuck Rhoades is targeted by an internal investigation. He is falsely accused of dropping the case against Bobby Axelrod because his wife received a $5 million severance package on the same day. Of course he does not see any flaw in the investigator, but blames Bobby Axelrod’s money, as if it is a viral infection.
